inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Create a team named "ad-1" if one does not exist
3. Type /test test-command valid navigate-internal
inline.testData: Step 2. is needed to prevent navigation attempt to non-existing team if the team does not exist.
inline.expectedResult: User is redirected to Town Square of team ad-1

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Make a post and expand the post options menu
3. Click the `navigate-internal ` option from the menu
inline.expectedResult: User is redirected to Town Square of team ad-1

inline.description:
1. Open a channel where the slash command bindings are available
2. Click the `navigate-internal` option from the channel header (or App Bar if it's enabled)
inline.expectedResult: User is redirected to Town Square of team ad-1
